**MicroNodes VPS Hosting**

_Why choose us?_

We are a company founded in 2016 to provide affordable and high quality KVM VPS's. We have spent many years buying hosting ourselves and know what kind of a host a customer wants. We sell unmanaged VPS's, but we provide as much support as we can. We will even help customers set up game servers on their VPS's as well. Our VPS's can have Windows (Bring Your Own License). Our goal is to provide fast support, high quality VPS's at an affordable rate. We utilize SpartanHost through Psychz Datacenter to host our nodes in Dallas, Texas.
